thread.section_title: Hotel Paris Bastille Boutet - MGallery Collection - UPDATED 2017 Reviews & Price Comparison (France) - TripAdvisor
thread.title: Perfect! - Review
thread.title_full: Perfect! - Review of Hotel Paris Bastille Boutet - MGallery Collection, Paris, France - TripAdvisor

author: jt375605
title: Perfect! - Review
text: I arrived at noon, tired after an overnight flight from the U.S. A room was ready early and I could immediately settle in and take a nice shower. The building is beautiful. The rooms are spacious by European standards, the bathroom is very large with a very nice shower. And then there is an impeccable staff. They were real pros. Not convinced yet? Well, just try the spa...a great bonus that I did not even know about. Hammam, sauna, swimming pool, private, quiet. Perfect after walking downtown all afternoon. And the bed is terrific as well. Oh, did I mention the location? Pretty much perfect, walking distance from, Place des Vosges, Theatre de la Bastille, etc. That pretty much sums it up. I will be back!
